title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Blue & Gold Fleet
directions: at Beach St and the Embarcadero
price: Bay Cruise: adults $24, seniors (62+) and teens $20, children (5-11) $16. RocketBoat: adults $26, seniors (62+) and teens $24, children (5-11) $21. Ferries (price varies by destination): adults $7.75-$12.50 one-way, children $5-$6.75 one-way
content: In addition to their bay cruise from Pier 39, Blue & Gold Fleet offers ferries from Pier 41 across the bay to Sausalito, Tiburon, Angel Island, Vallejo, and Alameda/Oakland. Blue & Gold Fleet also runs a "RocketBoat", a high-speed cruise of the bay in a sleek red boat.
